00057 template<class Node>
00058 bool node_fits_inside(Node *a, Node *b)
00059 {
00060     return bb_fits_inside(b->bb, b->bb+3, a->bb, a->bb+3);
00061 }
00062 
00063 template<class Node>
00064 void reorganize_find_fittest_parent(Node *tree, Node *node, std::pair<float,Node*> &cost)
00065 {
00066     std::queue<Node*> q;
00067     q.push(tree);
00068     
00069     while(!q.empty())
00070     {
00071         Node *parent = q.front();
00072         q.pop();
00073         
00074         if(parent == node) continue;
00075         if(node_fits_inside(node, parent) && RE_rayobject_isAligned(parent->child) )
00076         {
00077             float pcost = bb_area(parent->bb, parent->bb+3);
00078             cost = std::min( cost, std::make_pair(pcost,parent) );
00079             for(Node *child = parent->child; child; child = child->sibling)
00080                 q.push(child);          
00081         }
00082     }
00083 }
00084 
00085 static int tot_moves = 0;
00086 template<class Node>
00087 void reorganize(Node *root)
00088 {
00089     std::queue<Node*> q;
00090 
00091     q.push(root);
00092     while(!q.empty())
00093     {
00094         Node * node = q.front();
00095         q.pop();
00096         
00097         if( RE_rayobject_isAligned(node->child) )
00098         {
00099             for(Node **prev = &node->child; *prev; )
00100             {
00101                 assert( RE_rayobject_isAligned(*prev) ); 
00102                 q.push(*prev);
00103 
00104                 std::pair<float,Node*> best(FLT_MAX, root);
00105                 reorganize_find_fittest_parent( root, *prev, best );
00106 
00107                 if(best.second == node)
00108                 {
00109                     //Already inside the fitnest BB
00110                     prev = &(*prev)->sibling;
00111                 }
00112                 else
00113                 {
00114                     Node *tmp = *prev;
00115                     *prev = (*prev)->sibling;
00116                     
00117                     tmp->sibling =  best.second->child;
00118                     best.second->child = tmp;
00119                     
00120                     tot_moves++;
00121                 }
00122             
00123             
00124             }
00125         }
00126         if(node != root)
00127         {
00128         }
00129     }
00130 }

00132 /*
00133  * Prunes useless nodes from trees:
00134  *  erases nodes with total amount of primitives = 0
00135  *  prunes nodes with only one child (except if that child is a primitive)
00136  */
00137 template<class Node>
00138 void remove_useless(Node *node, Node **new_node)
00139 {
00140     if( RE_rayobject_isAligned(node->child) )
00141     {
00142 
00143         for(Node **prev = &node->child; *prev; )
00144         {
00145             Node *next = (*prev)->sibling;
00146             remove_useless(*prev, prev);
00147             if(*prev == NULL)
00148                 *prev = next;
00149             else
00150             {
00151                 (*prev)->sibling = next;
00152                 prev = &((*prev)->sibling);
00153             }
00154         }           
00155     }
00156     if(node->child)
00157     {
00158         if(RE_rayobject_isAligned(node->child) && node->child->sibling == 0)
00159             *new_node = node->child;
00160     }
00161     else if(node->child == NULL)
00162     {
00163         *new_node = NULL;
00164     }
00165 }

00167 /*
00168  * Minimizes expected number of BBtest by colapsing nodes
00169  * it uses surface area heuristic for determining whether a node should be colapsed
00170  */
00171 template<class Node>
00172 void pushup(Node *parent)
00173 {
00174     if(is_leaf(parent)) return;
00175     
00176     float p_area = bb_area(parent->bb, parent->bb+3);
00177     Node **prev = &parent->child;
00178     for(Node *child = parent->child; RE_rayobject_isAligned(child) && child; )
00179     {
00180         const float c_area = bb_area(child->bb, child->bb + 3);
00181         const int nchilds = count_childs(child);
00182         float original_cost = ((p_area != 0.0f)? (c_area / p_area)*nchilds: 1.0f) + 1;
00183         float flatten_cost = nchilds;
00184         if(flatten_cost < original_cost && nchilds >= 2)
00185         {
00186             append_sibling(child, child->child);
00187             child = child->sibling;
00188             *prev = child;
00189 
00190 //          *prev = child->child;
00191 //          append_sibling( *prev, child->sibling );
00192 //          child = *prev;
00193             tot_pushup++;
00194         }
00195         else
00196         {
00197             *prev = child;
00198             prev = &(*prev)->sibling;
00199             child = *prev;
00200         }       
00201     }
00202     
00203     for(Node *child = parent->child; RE_rayobject_isAligned(child) && child; child = child->sibling)
00204         pushup(child);
00205 }
00206 
00207 /*
00208  * try to optimize number of childs to be a multiple of SSize
00209  */
00210 template<class Node, int SSize>
00211 void pushup_simd(Node *parent)
00212 {
00213     if(is_leaf(parent)) return;
00214     
00215     int n = count_childs(parent);
00216         
00217     Node **prev = &parent->child;
00218     for(Node *child = parent->child; RE_rayobject_isAligned(child) && child; )
00219     {
00220         int cn = count_childs(child);
00221         if(cn-1 <= (SSize - (n%SSize) ) % SSize && RE_rayobject_isAligned(child->child) )
00222         {
00223             n += (cn - 1);
00224             append_sibling(child, child->child);
00225             child = child->sibling;
00226             *prev = child;  
00227         }
00228         else
00229         {
00230             *prev = child;
00231             prev = &(*prev)->sibling;
00232             child = *prev;
00233         }       
00234     }
00235         
00236     for(Node *child = parent->child; RE_rayobject_isAligned(child) && child; child = child->sibling)
00237         pushup_simd<Node,SSize>(child);
00238 }

00241 /*
00242  * Pushdown
00243  *  makes sure no child fits inside any of its sibling
00244  */
00245 template<class Node>
00246 void pushdown(Node *parent)
00247 {
00248     Node **s_child = &parent->child;
00249     Node * child = parent->child;
00250     
00251     while(child && RE_rayobject_isAligned(child))
00252     {
00253         Node *next = child->sibling;
00254         Node **next_s_child = &child->sibling;
00255         
00256         //assert(bb_fits_inside(parent->bb, parent->bb+3, child->bb, child->bb+3));
00257         
00258         for(Node *i = parent->child; RE_rayobject_isAligned(i) && i; i = i->sibling)
00259         if(child != i && bb_fits_inside(i->bb, i->bb+3, child->bb, child->bb+3) && RE_rayobject_isAligned(i->child))
00260         {
00261 //          todo optimize (should the one with the smallest area?)
00262 //          float ia = bb_area(i->bb, i->bb+3)
00263 //          if(child->i)
00264             *s_child = child->sibling;
00265             child->sibling = i->child;
00266             i->child = child;
00267             next_s_child = s_child;
00268             
00269             tot_pushdown++;
00270             break;
00271         }
00272         child = next;
00273         s_child = next_s_child;
00274     }
00275     
00276     for (Node *i = parent->child; RE_rayobject_isAligned(i) && i; i = i->sibling) {
00277         pushdown(i);
00278     }
00279 }

00281 
00282 /*
00283  * BVH refit
00284  * readjust nodes BB (useful if nodes childs where modified)
00285  */
00286 template<class Node>
00287 float bvh_refit(Node *node)
00288 {
00289     if(is_leaf(node)) return 0; 
00290     if(is_leaf(node->child)) return 0;
00291     
00292     float total = 0;
00293     
00294     for(Node *child = node->child; child; child = child->sibling)
00295         total += bvh_refit(child);
00296         
00297     float old_area = bb_area(node->bb, node->bb+3);
00298     INIT_MINMAX(node->bb, node->bb+3);
00299     for(Node *child = node->child; child; child = child->sibling)
00300     {
00301         DO_MIN(child->bb, node->bb);
00302         DO_MAX(child->bb+3, node->bb+3);
00303     }
00304     total += old_area - bb_area(node->bb, node->bb+3);
00305     return total;
00306 }

00309 /*
00310  * this finds the best way to packing a tree according to a given test cost function
00311  * with the purpose to reduce the expected cost (eg.: number of BB tests).
00312  */
00313 #include <vector>
00314 #define MAX_CUT_SIZE        4               /* svbvh assumes max 4 children! */
00315 #define MAX_OPTIMIZE_CHILDS MAX_CUT_SIZE
00316 
00317 struct OVBVHNode
00318 {
00319     float   bb[6];
00320 
00321     OVBVHNode *child;
00322     OVBVHNode *sibling;
00323     
00324     /*
00325      * Returns min cost to represent the subtree starting at the given node,
00326      * allowing it to have a given cutsize
00327      */
00328     float cut_cost[MAX_CUT_SIZE];
00329     float get_cost(int cutsize)
00330     {
00331         return cut_cost[cutsize-1];
00332     }
00333     
00334     /*
00335      * This saves the cut size of this child, when parent is reaching
00336      * its minimum cut with the given cut size
00337      */
00338     int cut_size[MAX_CUT_SIZE];
00339     int get_cut_size(int parent_cut_size)
00340     {
00341         return cut_size[parent_cut_size-1];
00342     }
00343     
00344     /*
00345      * Reorganize the node based on calculated cut costs
00346      */  
00347     int best_cutsize;
00348     void set_cut(int cutsize, OVBVHNode ***cut)
00349     {
00350         if(cutsize == 1)
00351         {
00352             **cut = this;
00353              *cut = &(**cut)->sibling;
00354         }
00355         else
00356         {
00357             if(cutsize > MAX_CUT_SIZE)
00358             {
00359                 for(OVBVHNode *child = this->child; child && RE_rayobject_isAligned(child); child = child->sibling)
00360                 {
00361                     child->set_cut( 1, cut );
00362                     cutsize--;
00363                 }
00364                 assert(cutsize == 0);
00365             }
00366             else
00367                 for(OVBVHNode *child = this->child; child && RE_rayobject_isAligned(child); child = child->sibling)
00368                     child->set_cut( child->get_cut_size( cutsize ), cut );
00369         }
00370     }
00371 
00372     void optimize()
00373     {
00374         if(RE_rayobject_isAligned(this->child))
00375         {
00376             //Calc new childs
00377             {
00378                 OVBVHNode **cut = &(this->child);
00379                 set_cut( best_cutsize, &cut );
00380                 *cut = NULL;
00381             }
00382 
00383             //Optimize new childs
00384             for(OVBVHNode *child = this->child; child && RE_rayobject_isAligned(child); child = child->sibling)
00385                 child->optimize();
00386         }       
00387     }
00388 };
00389 
00390 /*
00391  * Calculates an optimal SIMD packing
00392  *
00393  */
00394 template<class Node, class TestCost>
00395 struct VBVH_optimalPackSIMD
00396 {
00397     TestCost testcost;
00398     
00399     VBVH_optimalPackSIMD(TestCost testcost)
00400     {
00401         this->testcost = testcost;
00402     }
00403     
00404     /*
00405      * calc best cut on a node
00406      */
00407     struct calc_best
00408     {
00409         Node *child[MAX_OPTIMIZE_CHILDS];
00410         float child_hit_prob[MAX_OPTIMIZE_CHILDS];
00411         
00412         calc_best(Node *node)
00413         {
00414             int nchilds = 0;
00415             //Fetch childs and needed data
00416             {
00417                 float parent_area = bb_area(node->bb, node->bb+3);
00418                 for(Node *child = node->child; child && RE_rayobject_isAligned(child); child = child->sibling)
00419                 {
00420                     this->child[nchilds] = child;
00421                     this->child_hit_prob[nchilds] = (parent_area != 0.0f)? bb_area(child->bb, child->bb+3) / parent_area: 1.0f;
00422                     nchilds++;
00423                 }
00424 
00425                 assert(nchilds >= 2 && nchilds <= MAX_OPTIMIZE_CHILDS);
00426             }
00427             
00428             
00429             //Build DP table to find minimum cost to represent this node with a given cutsize
00430             int   bt  [MAX_OPTIMIZE_CHILDS+1][MAX_CUT_SIZE+1]; //backtrace table
00431             float cost[MAX_OPTIMIZE_CHILDS+1][MAX_CUT_SIZE+1]; //cost table (can be reduced to float[2][MAX_CUT_COST])
00432             
00433             for(int i=0; i<=nchilds; i++)
00434             for(int j=0; j<=MAX_CUT_SIZE; j++)
00435                 cost[i][j] = INFINITY;
00436 
00437             cost[0][0] = 0;
00438             
00439             for(int i=1; i<=nchilds; i++)
00440             for(int size=i-1; size/*+(nchilds-i)*/<=MAX_CUT_SIZE; size++)
00441             for(int cut=1; cut+size/*+(nchilds-i)*/<=MAX_CUT_SIZE; cut++)
00442             {
00443                 float new_cost = cost[i-1][size] + child_hit_prob[i-1]*child[i-1]->get_cost(cut);
00444                 if(new_cost < cost[i][size+cut])
00445                 {
00446                     cost[i][size+cut] = new_cost;
00447                     bt[i][size+cut] = cut;
00448                 }
00449             }
00450             
00451             //Save the ways to archieve the minimum cost with a given cutsize
00452             for(int i = nchilds; i <= MAX_CUT_SIZE; i++)
00453             {
00454                 node->cut_cost[i-1] = cost[nchilds][i];
00455                 if(cost[nchilds][i] < INFINITY)
00456                 {
00457                     int current_size = i;
00458                     for(int j=nchilds; j>0; j--)
00459                     {
00460                         child[j-1]->cut_size[i-1] = bt[j][current_size];
00461                         current_size -= bt[j][current_size];
00462                     }
00463                 }
00464             }           
00465         }
00466     };
00467     
00468     void calc_costs(Node *node)
00469     {
00470         
00471         if( RE_rayobject_isAligned(node->child) )
00472         {
00473             int nchilds = 0;
00474             for(Node *child = node->child; child && RE_rayobject_isAligned(child); child = child->sibling)
00475             {
00476                 calc_costs(child);
00477                 nchilds++;
00478             }
00479 
00480             for(int i=0; i<MAX_CUT_SIZE; i++)
00481                 node->cut_cost[i] = INFINITY;
00482 
00483             //We are not allowed to look on nodes with with so many childs
00484             if(nchilds > MAX_CUT_SIZE)
00485             {
00486                 float cost = 0;
00487 
00488                 float parent_area = bb_area(node->bb, node->bb+3);
00489                 for(Node *child = node->child; child && RE_rayobject_isAligned(child); child = child->sibling)
00490                 {
00491                     cost += ((parent_area != 0.0f)? ( bb_area(child->bb, child->bb+3) / parent_area ): 1.0f) * child->get_cost(1);
00492                 }
00493                 
00494                 cost += testcost(nchilds);
00495                 node->cut_cost[0] = cost;
00496                 node->best_cutsize = nchilds;
00497             }
00498             else
00499             {
00500                 calc_best calc(node);
00501         
00502                 //calc expected cost if we optimaly pack this node
00503                 for(int cutsize=nchilds; cutsize<=MAX_CUT_SIZE; cutsize++)
00504                 {
00505                     float m = node->get_cost(cutsize) + testcost(cutsize);
00506                     if(m < node->cut_cost[0])
00507                     {
00508                         node->cut_cost[0] = m;
00509                         node->best_cutsize = cutsize;
00510                     }
00511                 }
00512             }
00513             assert(node->cut_cost[0] != INFINITY);
00514         }
00515         else
00516         {
00517             node->cut_cost[0] = 1.0f;
00518             for(int i=1; i<MAX_CUT_SIZE; i++)
00519                 node->cut_cost[i] = INFINITY;
00520         }
00521     }
00522 
00523     Node *transform(Node *node)
00524     {
00525         if(RE_rayobject_isAligned(node->child))
00526         {
00527             static int num = 0;
00528             bool first = false;
00529             if(num == 0) { num++; first = true; }
00530             
00531             calc_costs(node);
00532             if((G.debug & G_DEBUG) && first) printf("expected cost = %f (%d)\n", node->cut_cost[0], node->best_cutsize );
00533             node->optimize();
00534         }
00535         return node;        
00536     }   
00537 };
